channel.title: Request: Wallpaper/Screensaver?
channel.description:
Pardon me for being new here; if this belongs in another forum please move it there.
Has anyone made (or could someone make) a wallpaper and screensaver for BMS? Meaning the Superbus Via Inscientiae wallpaper and rotating Black Mesa logo screensaver seen in-game on BMS screens.
Thanks! I'm enjoying the remake quite a lot (I even liked the shortened "On A Rail", although there were a couple of firefights I missed).

item.title: Request: Wallpaper/Screensaver?
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
You are very welcome folks. Remember, I am not just a Black Mesa team member, I am also a FAN!

=)

That said, I do have access to a screensaver that can work with both movie files and image files. If you have something to send to me, I would be very happy to throw it into a ss for ya.

email is the best way to get ahold of me.

Read full topic

item.title: Request: Wallpaper/Screensaver?
item.dc:creator: Dadster
item.description:
Thanks CatzEyes93.

You’re the Catz meow!

Read full topic

item.title: Request: Wallpaper/Screensaver?
item.dc:creator: Jonny_B_Goode
item.description:
I’m hoping for a silver rotating black mesa log, like in the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Request: Wallpaper/Screensaver?
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
I have them in case anyone wants them. The file for the screensaver is huge tho. Basically, it is all of the chapter loads all put together.

Email me if you want them.

CatzEyes93 gmail

Edit: No. Dont email me. Just get them here. https://sdrv.ms/15ovfE4

Read full topic

item.title: Request: Wallpaper/Screensaver?
item.dc:creator: Kenley
item.description:
BM’s Facebook page has a bunch of fan-made wallpapers in an album, and some of them are very good, I think.

There used to be an official theme pack and screensavers, linked here, but they seem to be gone now, unfortunately.

Read full topic

item.title: Request: Wallpaper/Screensaver?
item.dc:creator: Cheerios
item.description:
There used to be desktop icons, wallpapers and screensavers on the black mesa facebook, but I don’t know if it is available anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: Request: Wallpaper/Screensaver?
item.dc:creator: Swaggless
item.description:
Welcome!

Nothing like that has been made to my knowledge… You may be able to find something digging though the game’s assets, though.

However, you can find plenty of wallpapers with the BMRF logo on it if you google “Black Mesa Wallpaper”.

My current wallpaper looks a lot like this.

Read full topic
